useCases.title: Web Scraping Proxies
useCases.description: Find the best proxy providers for web scraping at scale. Compare pricing on residential and datacenter proxies optimized for data extraction.

content.overview: Web scraping requires proxies that can handle high-volume requests while avoiding IP blocks. The right proxy provider depends on your scale, target sites, and budget.
content.providerCriteria: Providers ranked by price per GB with residential proxy options for avoiding detection and datacenter proxies for high-volume, cost-sensitive scraping.

useCases.title: Sneaker Bot Proxies
useCases.description: Compare proxy providers for sneaker botting. Find residential and ISP proxies with low latency for sneaker copping success.

content.overview: Sneaker bots require ultra-low latency proxies from residential IPs to maximize checkout success. ISP proxies offer the best balance of speed and legitimacy for sneaker releases.
content.providerCriteria: Providers ranked by ISP proxy availability and residential proxy quality, with emphasis on session stability and speed.

useCases.title: Ad Verification Proxies
useCases.description: Find proxy providers for ad verification and fraud detection. Compare residential proxies for geo-targeted ad monitoring.

content.overview: Ad verification requires proxies from diverse geographic locations to verify ad placement and detect fraud. Residential proxies are essential for accessing ads as real users would see them.
content.providerCriteria: Providers ranked by geographic coverage and residential proxy pool size, critical for accurate ad verification.

useCases.title: SEO Monitoring Proxies
useCases.description: Compare proxy providers for SEO monitoring and rank tracking. Find affordable residential proxies for accurate search engine position tracking.

content.overview: SEO monitoring requires proxies to check search engine rankings from different locations without getting blocked. Residential proxies provide the most accurate ranking data by mimicking real user behavior.
content.providerCriteria: Providers ranked by price efficiency and SERP success rates for residential proxies used in rank tracking.

useCases.title: Social Media Automation Proxies
useCases.description: Find proxy providers for social media automation. Compare mobile and residential proxies for managing multiple accounts safely.

content.overview: Social media automation requires high-trust proxies to avoid account bans. Mobile proxies offer the highest trust scores for platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and Twitter, while residential proxies are a cost-effective alternative.
content.providerCriteria: Providers ranked by mobile proxy availability and residential proxy quality for social media platform compatibility.

useCases.title: Ticket Bot Proxies
useCases.description: Find the best proxies for ticket purchasing bots. Compare residential and ISP proxies for buying event tickets without IP blocks.

content.overview: Ticket bots require high-trust residential proxies to bypass IP-based purchase limits on ticketing platforms. Sticky sessions are essential for maintaining checkout flow.
content.providerCriteria: Providers ranked by residential proxy quality, rotation capabilities, and sticky session stability for ticket purchasing.

useCases.title: Amazon Scraping Proxies
useCases.description: Find proxy providers optimized for Amazon scraping. Compare residential proxies for extracting product data without anti-bot detection.

content.overview: Amazon has sophisticated anti-bot systems that require premium residential proxies for successful scraping. Rotating IPs with proper session management are essential.
content.providerCriteria: Providers ranked by residential proxy quality and success rates with e-commerce platforms including Amazon.

useCases.title: Lead Generation Proxies
useCases.description: Compare proxies for lead generation and contact scraping. Find residential proxies for extracting business contact data at scale.

content.overview: Lead generation requires scraping business directories, social media, and company websites. Residential proxies help avoid blocks while gathering contact information.
content.providerCriteria: Providers ranked by price efficiency and residential proxy pool size for high-volume lead scraping.

useCases.title: Market Research Proxies
useCases.description: Find proxies for market research and competitive intelligence. Compare residential proxies for gathering competitor data anonymously.

content.overview: Market research requires anonymous access to competitor websites, pricing data, and industry trends. Residential proxies provide the legitimacy needed for comprehensive data collection.
content.providerCriteria: Providers ranked by global IP coverage and price efficiency for large-scale market research operations.

useCases.title: Stock Trading Proxies
useCases.description: Find low-latency proxies for stock trading and financial data. Compare datacenter proxies for real-time market access.

content.overview: Stock trading and financial applications require ultra-low latency connections. Datacenter proxies located near exchanges provide the fastest execution times.
content.providerCriteria: Providers ranked by datacenter proxy speed, latency, and reliability for financial trading applications.
